programme.title: Realtree Outdoors
programme.desc: Team Realtree hunts at the famous Honey Brake in Louisiana.

programme.title: Roger Raglin Outdoors
programme.desc: Hog hunting and gulf fishing are on the docket as Roger spends a two weeks in Florida making the rounds.

programme.title: The Obsession of Carter Andrews
programme.desc: Carter Andrews heads to the South Carolina Low Country to explore it's diversity with good friend John Irwin.

programme.title: Trev Gowdy's Monster Fish
programme.desc: GIANT TIGER SHARKS attack massive schools of amberjack 40 miles off the coast of Florida. Fred fights his way up the food chain to bring a true monster Tiger Shark to the boat.

programme.desc: Holy Hollywood Weapons! Terry and Larry put some of your favorite Superheroes to the test. Tune in to the same Bat Outdoor Channel for the results!

programme.title: Survival Science
programme.desc: Nick and Laura create kick-ass tests to explore the immense power and startling speed of grizzly bears. They use Hollywood stunt tools to experience an attack. Then they try to recreate a “miracle” arrow shot that saved a man from being killed by a bear.

programme.title: Fight To Survive
programme.desc: A rock-climbing disaster hurtles climber Craig DeMartino 100 feet down a granite cliff. A shattered heap of broken bones, Craig clings to life. In a split second, Craig's life becomes an inspiring fight to survive.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.desc: In this iconic scene, Chief Brody hangs on to his sinking boat as a giant shark approaches him with a scuba tank lodged in its mouth. We construct a giant shark on a motorized platform to test if you can hit, and explode, the tank with an M1 Garand rifle while perched in a precarious position.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: In this classic western, Clint Eastwood ' aka 'Blondie' ' saves Eli Wallach from the hangman's noose three separate times by shooting and severing the rope that he hangs from. We recreate each scene and test the reality of these shots with the weapons that were used.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.desc: Terry and Larry will be testing the effectiveness of driving a vehicle with fully automatic machine guns mounted to the car! Just like 007 did with his Aston Martin DB5.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.sub-title: Paint Your Red River Stagecoach at High Noon
programme.desc: Terry and Larry will test different famous shots from westerns. Can you shoot a cowboy hat off the bad guy? Will a shotgun blast really throw you back through a window? Can a single shot from a colt revolver break shackles? If you shoot dynamite, will it explode?

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.desc: Terry gets to relive part of his military carrier by attempting the famous sniper shot from Saving Private Ryan, and Larry and Terry demonstrate how sniper technology has developed over the years and test some amazing sniper shots.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.sub-title: The Last Crusade of Indiana Terry
programme.desc: Terry channels his inner Dr. Jones and tests 1 scene from Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade containing 3 different tests, two of which require a tank! The duo will travel down to Uvalde, TX to visit Drivetanks.com to see if a tank round will topple over a car, and if a 9mm round can travel through three Germans.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.desc: Terry and Larry get to test several scenes from Horror films! Terry wants to test the best way to kill a Zombie, just in case he ever ends up in a Zombie Apocalypse, and they will test a big scene from the horror classic, Freddie vs. Jason!

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.desc: Terry and Larry tackle the epic Lethal Weapon series testing 4 different scenes. Can a Surfboard act as a projectile going through a car windshield and killing the bad guy? Can a 9mm bullet go through a bulldozer bucket to stop the driver? And will a AK47 be able to fire under water?

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.desc: Who left Terry Home Alone? Larry did. Terry and Larry test several scenes from the classic film series Home Alone.

programme.title: Hollywood Weapons
programme.desc: Terry channels his inner Jason Bourne to test some of the best moments from the series of films.

programme.title: Life on the Edge
programme.desc: Charlie Summerville gives his cabin-build crew a much-needed vacation, but their Aleutian fishing adventure does not go to plan. Umnak cattle rancher Pat Harvie resurrects a mechanical beast. Kodiak fishing guide and tracker, Nick Blanco, goes log hunting to stretch his finances.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's UNCHARTED
programme.desc: Jim returns to Russia to traverse frigid rivers and hills in search of Siberian Brown bears.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures
programme.sub-title: A Hawaiian Axis Deer Hunt with Eva
programme.desc: Jim heads to Hawaii with his Eva to go after the famed Axis deer.
